author: Daniel Greene
description:
🔥 HUGE Fantasy & Sci-Fi News! 🔥  From the Murderbot first look to a new Avatar: The Last Airbender show, this episode is stacked! Plus, Dandelion Dynasty gets a fresh set of covers, Amazon makes a terrible Kindle decision, and Valve cracks down on ads in games. Let’s break it all down!

02:37 Narnia Stage Play 🦁🎭: The world of Narnia comes to the stage! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ABQog-yuamg&ab_channel=TheAcademyofArts%E2%80%A2LogosTheatre

title: WARNING: Amazon Devalues ALL Kindles and Ebooks, Murderbot First Look, & More ~FN~
